name: Fu Da Chinese Restaurant
hours: Sunday: 12:00pm to 10:30pm, Monday-Tuesday & Thursday: 11:00am to 10:30pm, Friday-Saturady: 11:00am to 11:00pm, Closed Wednesday
notes: Known for its modern interpretation of classic dishes and its insistence on only using high quality fresh ingredients.
No-frills nook for hearty counter-serve or take-out Chinese standards such as chow mein.
